name: squelchy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
making a sucking sound like the one produced when you are walking on soft, wet ground: The ground was soft and squelchy when she got out of the car. They mountain-biked through squelchy mud. See
squelch
More examplesFewer examplesMost of the terrain is squelchy bog.Saline breast implants look real, but they can be a bit squelchy.Tinnitus may be like the rhythmic sound of a repeated loud, squelchy thump.
